captions.text:
- OUR NEXT GUESTS ARE PROBABLY
THE MOST FAMOUS
DANCING SIBLINGS IN THE WORLD.

HERE TO PERFORM FROM THEIR
"MOVE LIVE ON TOUR,"

PLEASE WELCOME JULIANNE
AND DEREK HOUGH.
[cheers and applause]
[playful dance music]
[playful dance music]
[playful dance music]
[music stops]
[cheers and applause]
I LOVE WATCHING Y'ALL DANCE.

THAT'S THE WAY MY BROTHER AND I
DANCE ALL THE TIME.

- PERFECT.
YOU'LL FIT RIGHT IN.

- OH, MAN, THIS IS SO EXCITING
TO SEE YOU BOTH.

I LOVE YOU BOTH.
TELL US ABOUT THE TOUR.

- WELL, I MEAN, YOU KNOW,
WE'RE GONNA GO OUT

ALL ACROSS AMERICA
AND PERFORM, LIKE,
A ROCK CONCERT FOR DANCE.
- YEAH.
[cheers and applause]

- IT'S BASICALLY WHAT WE'VE
WORKED OUR ENTIRE LIVES TO DO.
WE'RE GONNA GO OUT AND DANCE,
AND WE'RE GONNA SING.

BASICALLY ALL OF OUR DREAMS THAT
WE'VE EVER WANTED TO DO,

AND IT'S ALL BECAUSE
EVERYWHERE WERE GO,

EVERYBODY ALWAYS ASKS WHEN WE'RE
GONNA DO SOMETHING TOGETHER,
SO...

- AND ALSO WE WANT TO INTERACT
WITH THE AUDIENCE A LOT,

SO THE SHOW IS GOING TO BE
VERY, VERY INTERACTIVE.

SO IF YOU GUYS COME,
EXPECT TO DANCE.
- OH, YEAH.
[cheers and applause]

AND OF COURSE,
BEING YOUR AUDIENCE,

I MEAN, YOU KNOW MORE THAN
ANYBODY,
WE'RE MEANT TO MOVE.
- YES.

AND YOU WON'T HAVE TO TALK RIGHT
AFTER YOU DANCE LIKE THIS,
BECAUSE...

- MAYBE.
- THAT'S SO NOT FAIR.

BUT I HAVE TO ASK YOU
ONE MORE QUESTION,

BECAUSE, DEREK, YOU HAVE
AN AMAZING PARTNER

ON "DANCING WITH THE STARS"
THIS SEASON.
LET'S HEAR ABOUT HER.
- AMY PURDY.
SHE IS A PARALYMPIAN.
SHE HAS TWO PROSTHETIC LEGS,

AND SHE'S JUST A BEACON
OF LIGHT, YOU KNOW?
SHE'S AN AMAZING PERSON

WHO JUST HAS DEFIED
ALL THE ODDS,

AND IT'S JUST BEEN A PRIVILEGE
TO BE A PART OF THAT.
IT'S VERY INSPIRING.
IT'S GIVEN ME NEW MEANING...

- YEAH.
- TO BE A PART OF THE SHOW.

- I BET.
IT'S REALLY IMPRESSIVE.

ALL RIGHT, I'M NOT GONNA MAKE
YOU TALK ANYMORE.

HERE'S A TOWEL.
- THANK YOU. APPRECIATED.
- I LOVE YOU TWO SO MUCH.
I JUST LOVE WATCHING YOU DANCE.

FOR MORE INFORMATION ON
"MOVE LIVE ON TOUR,"
GO TO OUR WEBSITE.
AND THANKS TO AM-EX,

EVERYONE IN THE AUDIENCE
IS GONNA GET A PAIR OF TICKETS

TO GO SEE THEM
AND DANCE WITH THEM.
[cheers and applause]
WE'LL BE RIGHT BACK.

comments.author: aboOu89

comments.text:
Okay, now it's my turn to judge. :)  First I love you Derek and 
Julianne...you both are such professional, top-notch dancers and I'm a DWTS 
devotee! This will be fun; my critique!  Okay, first, Julianne, you made a 
tiny step error at the beginning of the routine, but you recovered quickly, 
although I have to consider that in my score for this dance.  The routine 
was awesome, quick and you and the dance team were all in sync, with the 
exception of the time when you were waiting to be picked up by the guys, or 
when you were being twirled around and your legs were apart. The timing 
during that move was too slow, and it was strange & awkward from a viewer's 
perspective.  Derek, you are always amazing, quick and seemed to be in 
perfect timing with your moves and your partner, Julianne. Other than 
noticeable hesitation from the "group team dancers," Julianne & Derek, you 
are both going to rock the crowds as the amazing, talented dancers that you 
are!  I also did not care for a look of running shorts under the dress, but 
then again, I have seen some very creative costumes on DWTS, so I am being 
picky. Otherwise....keep moving and God bless you all!  SCORE: 9   :)  
P.S.  Julianne, you should leave the judge position and join the dancers 
again on DWTS next season!﻿
